name: Wheeler Real Estate Investment Trust, Inc.
description: Wheeler Real Estate Investment Trust, Inc. (WHLRD) is a publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses on the acquisition and management of retail and commercial properties primarily in the southeastern United States. Founded in 2012 and headquartered in Virginia Beach, Virginia, WHLRD aims to create value through property ownership, leasing, and development. The company specializes in shopping centers, community centers, and other retail spaces, targeting properties with potential for appreciation and strong tenant demand. Through strategic partnerships and an experienced management team, Wheeler Real Estate Investment Trust is committed to enhancing shareholder value by optimizing property performance and pursuing accretive acquisitions. The company is known for its focus on community engagement and sustainability, ensuring that its properties contribute positively to the neighborhoods they serve. WHLRD is also actively involved in repositioning and redeveloping underperforming assets to maximize their potential. The company strives to maintain a diversified portfolio and a sustainable growth strategy, aligning with current market trends and consumer behaviors in the retail sector.
